itemDisplayName: Create a Web App with Private endpoint protected by Application Gateway v2
description: This template creates an Azure Web App with Private endpoint in Azure Virtual Network Subnet , an Application Gateway v2. The Application Gateway is deployed in a vNet (subnet). The Web App restricts access to traffic from the subnet using private endpoint
summary: This template creates an Azure Web App with Private endpoint in Azure Virtual Network Subnet , an Application Gateway v2. The Application Gateway is deployed in a vNet (subnet). The Web App restricts access to traffic from the subnet using private endpoint.
